content: इद् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} A particle of affirmation, even, just, only; especially in strengthening a statement; अर्थज्ञ इत्सकलं भद्रमश्नुते <ls>Nir.</ls> {@--2@} It is often added to words expressing excess or exclusion; विश्व इत्, एक इत् &c. {@--3@} At the beginning of sentences it often adds emphasis to pronouns, prepositions &c. (Its place is taken by एव in classical Sanskrit).
